mapper.select: SELECT li.id,ll.live_title,ll.live_picture,li.status,li.mid,li.push_stream,li.pull_stream,li.replay_url,li.price,li.h5_url, li.password,li.live_type,li.reward_percent,li.orientation,li.create_time,li.update_time,lt.id as tid,lt.title, lt.tag_pic,lt.tag_type,li.start_time,li.end_time,li.description FROM ${liveDB}.lc_live_index li LEFT JOIN ${liveDB}.lc_video_tag lt on li.tags = lt.id JOIN ${liveDB}.lc_live${@com.bingdou.core.model.live.Live@getTableNumber(liveId)} ll ON li.id=ll.lid WHERE li.id=#{liveId}
SELECT id FROM ${liveDB}.lc_live_index WHERE id=#{liveId} and mid = #{mid}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ${liveDB}.lc_live_index WHERE mid=#{mid} and status != -1
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
INSERT INTO ${liveDB}.lc_live_index(id,live_title,live_picture,push_stream,status,pull_stream, h5_url,stream_name,mid,tags,password,price,reward_percent,orientation,live_type,create_time,update_time,start_time) VALUE(#{id},#{liveTitle},#{livePicture},#{pushStream},#{status},#{pullStream},#{h5Url}, #{streamName},#{mid},#{tags},#{password},#{price},#{rewardPercent},#{orientation},#{liveType},now(),now(),#{startTime})
mapper.select: SELECT li.id,li.live_picture,li.live_title,li.push_stream,li.pull_stream,li.replay_url,li.h5_url,li.mid, ml.avatar,ml.signature,ml.gender,ml.nickname,ml.cpid,li.status,li.orientation, li.start_time,li.end_time,li.create_time,li.update_time FROM ${userDB}.mc_focus_info fi JOIN ${liveDB}.lc_live_index li ON li.mid = fi.follow_id JOIN ${userDB}.mc_member_index ml ON li.mid = ml.id WHERE fi.mid=#{userId} AND li.status != -1 GROUP BY fi.follow_id ORDER BY li.status,li.create_time DESC limit #{start},#{limit}
SELECT id,live_picture FROM ${liveDB}.lc_live_index WHERE status=1 and live_type=1 order by create_time DESC limit #{start},#{limit}
SELECT id,live_picture FROM ${liveDB}.lc_live_index WHERE status=1 and live_type=2 order by create_time DESC limit #{start},#{limit}

SELECT li.id,li.live_title,li.live_picture,li.status,li.mid,li.push_stream,li.pull_stream,li.replay_url,li.price, li.password,li.live_type,li.reward_percent,li.orientation,li.create_time,li.update_time,lt.id as tid,lt.title, lt.tag_pic,lt.tag_type,li.start_time,li.end_time FROM ${liveDB}.lc_live_index li LEFT JOIN ${liveDB}.lc_video_tag lt on li.tags = lt.id WHERE li.stream_name=#{streamName}

SELECT li.id,li.live_title,li.live_picture,li.status,li.mid,li.push_stream,li.pull_stream,li.replay_url,li.price, li.password,li.live_type,li.reward_percent,li.orientation,li.create_time,li.update_time,lt.id as tid,lt.title, lt.tag_pic,lt.tag_type,li.start_time,li.end_time FROM ${liveDB}.lc_live_index li LEFT JOIN ${liveDB}.lc_video_tag lt on li.tags = lt.id WHERE li.mid=#{userId} and li.status!=-1 order by li.status,li.create_time desc limit #{start},#{limit}

SELECT li.id,li.live_title,li.live_picture,li.status,li.mid,li.push_stream,li.pull_stream,li.replay_url,li.price, li.password,li.live_type,li.reward_percent,li.orientation,li.create_time,li.update_time,lt.id as tid,lt.title, lt.tag_pic,lt.tag_type,li.start_time,li.end_time, ml.avatar,ml.signature,ml.gender,ml.nickname,ml.cpid FROM ${liveDB}.lc_live_index li JOIN ${liveDB}.lc_video_tag lt on li.tags = lt.id JOIN ${userDB}.mc_member_index ml ON li.mid = ml.id WHERE li.tags=#{tagId} and li.status!=-1 order by li.status,li.create_time desc limit #{start},#{limit}
